snippet: In a letter to the National Football League commissioner, Senator Maria Cantwell and Representative Tom Cole mentioned the league’s tax-exempt status.
abstract: Sen Maria Cantwell and Rep Tom Cole plan to send a strongly worded letter to National Football League commissioner Roger Goodell urging him to support changing the name of the Washington Redskins; Cantwell says she may reconsider the league's tax-exempt status if it does not comply.
lead_paragraph: In a letter to the National Football League commissioner, Senator Maria Cantwell and Representative Tom Cole mentioned the league’s tax-exempt status.

headline.main: Lawmakers Press N.F.L. on Name Change for Washington Redskins
headline.print_headline: Lawmakers Press N.F.L. on Name of Redskins
